longTitle.p: COUNCIL IMPLEMENTING REGULATION (EU) 2020/371of 5 March 2020implementing Article 21(5) of Regulation (EU) 2016/44 concerning restrictive measures in view of the situation in Libya

formula.name: actingEntity
formula.p: THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,

citation.p: Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,

Having regard to Council Regulation (EU) 2016/44 of 18 January 2016 concerning restrictive measures in view of the situation in Libya and repealing Regulation (EU) No 204/2011
OJ L 12, 19.1.2016, p. 1., and in particular Article 21(5) thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy,

recital.p: On 18 January 2016, the Council adopted Regulation (EU) 2016/44.

On 25 February 2020, the United Nations Security Council ('UNSC') Committee established pursuant to UNSC Resolution 1970 (2011) updated the information relating to five persons subject to restrictive measures.
Annex II to Regulation (EU) 2016/44 should therefore be amended accordingly,

content.p: Annex II to Regulation (EU) 2016/44 is amended as set out in the Annex to this Regulation.
This Regulation shall enter into force on the date of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Union.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
